NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
September 1952
Graydon Ausmus
Station WUQA
University of Alabama
University, Ala*
Dear Graydon *
I think you sent out a good memo under date of August 26. It
certainly sums up the problem*
To answer your questions specifically*
One, I, of course, am in favor of the top level man although I
am not necessarily in favor of paying him substantially more than
the present budget stands for.
Two, 1 have gone over thoroughly the minutes of the Gotham meet¬
ing. I think this should bei redrawn* I have no real quarrel
with what is said here but 1 believe it was drawn almost in the
heat of battle and tends to be punitive. It certainly could be
much more constructive. If it could be rewritten with the per¬
sonalities involved forgotten, 1 believe it would be a much more
workable document.
/Vo T
Three, I have^further suggestions to offer. 1 would like to see
Rishworth and ‘Russ Porter more thoroughly investigated and would
like to know too of the possible availability of Harry Skornia.
Sorry this reply is late. Rest assured 1*11 do anything I can
to help.
Sincerely,
Jxmmiles
Executive director
JSMsrtb
